title: Shimano crank recall: Shimano finally announces 11-speed Hollowtech II crankset recall
content:
A voluntary inspection and replacement recall notice for certain bonded 11-speed Shimano Hollowtech II road cranksets.

Read the full article at Shimano crank recall: Shimano finally announces 11-speed Hollowtech II crankset recall on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
